item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Death is a stripping away of all that is not you. The secret of life is to "die before you die" --- and find that there is no death." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Life will give you whatever experience is most helpful for the evolution of your consciousness. How do you know this is the experience you need? Because this is the experience you are having at the moment." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Life is the dancer and you are the dance." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "All true artists, whether they know it or not, create from a place of no-mind, from inner stillness." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Give up defining yourself - to yourself or to others. You won't die. You will come to life. And don't be concerned with how others define you. When they define you, they are limiting themselves, so it's their problem. Whenever you interact with people, don't be there primarily as a function or a role, but as the field of conscious Presence. You can only lose something that you have, but you cannot lose something that you are." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Hafiz
item.description: "I am the hole on the flute that Gods breath flows through." -- Hafiz

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "When another recognizes you, that recognition draws the dimension of Being more fully into this world through both of you. That is the love that redeems the world." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Don't let a mad world tell you that success is anything other than a successful present moment." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Once you have had a glimpse of awareness or Presence, you know it firsthand. It is no longer just a concept in your mind." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Awareness is the greatest agent for change." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Words reduce reality to something the human mind can grasp, which isnâ€™t very much." -- Eckhart Tolle

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "A genuine relationship is one that is not dominated by the ego with its image-making and self-seeking. In a genuine relationship, there is an outward flow of open, alert attention toward the other person in which there is no wanting whatsoever." -- Eckhart Tolle
